name: world-bank-data-api
description: A server that fetches data indicators available with the World Bank as part of their data API

examples.title: List Countries
examples.description: Lists available countries in the World Bank open data API.
examples.prompt: List all countries available in the World Bank data.

examples.title: List Indicators
examples.description: Lists available indicators in the World Bank open data API.
examples.prompt: List all indicators available in the World Bank data.

examples.title: Analyze Indicators
examples.description: Analyzes specific indicators for a selected country.
examples.prompt: Analyze the poverty indicators for Kenya.
